title: STA 1200 - Statistics with Applications (3) [B4]
preReq: STA 1200 - Statistics with Applications (3) [B4]     Sample and population data; descriptive statistics, including numerical and graphical summarization of central tendency and spread; elementary probability, including events, basic probability rules, binomial and normal distributions; inferential statistics, including confidence intervals and hypothesis tests for one-population mean and proportion problems, simple linear regression and correlationPrerequisite(s): Category I, Category II, ALEKS >=46, C or better in a GE Sub-area B4 course, or C- or better or CR in MAT 1051 .
